message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $105. What do you think?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $107.50. What do you think?
